trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: 開始的觸發程序動作<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>和其動畫散發至其目標的物件和屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use a BeginStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: 使用與 BeginStoryboard 動作<xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>或<xref:System.Windows.Trigger>動畫套用至其目標屬性，並啟動它們。</xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: BeginStoryboard begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: BeginStoryboard 開始<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>上其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>參考時觸發。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of BeginStoryboard determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: 當您開始<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>已經由另一個動畫的屬性上<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>、 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A>BeginStoryboard 的屬性會決定如何繼續動畫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: 暫停、 繼續、 停止或否則控制項分鏡腳本以互動方式可以暫停、 繼續或控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>，已標記中宣告，以互動方式，您必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>屬性其 BeginStoryboard。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) 來控制參考其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of BeginStoryboard is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>BeginStoryboard 是未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>無法在之後開始時以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a BeginStoryboard.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中的程式碼，您可能使用的互動式方法<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>類別來控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，已套用使用 BeginStoryboard。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the BeginStoryboard a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下使用時<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件，您必須提供 BeginStoryboard 的名稱及其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>要以互動方式控制。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定適當的遞交行為在這個腳本中啟動動畫時鐘

trans-unit.source: ## Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: ##撰寫 HandoffBehavior 時使用您套用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>屬性使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName>，任何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>之前與該屬性相關聯的物件會繼續耗用系統資源; 計時系統不會自動移除這些時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生效能問題，當您套用大量使用時鐘<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>，在它們完成之後，您應該從動畫屬性移除組成的時鐘。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: 有數種方式可移除時鐘:-若要從屬性移除所有時鐘，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>動畫物件的方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: 指定的第一個參數，要繪製之屬性和`null`做為第二個。

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: 這會從屬性移除所有動畫時鐘。

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -若要移除<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>的時鐘，清單中使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>來擷取<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>，然後呼叫此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>方法的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>特定

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>時鐘的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，只有根時鐘可以控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>;<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>子時鐘的屬性會傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>是否有效的持續時間的時鐘永遠不會呼叫事件。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，使用者必須決定何時呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 這是主要的動畫長的存留期的物件上的問題。

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收物件時，也會中斷其時鐘和記憶體回收。

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需時鐘物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[動畫和計時系統概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: By naming the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> object, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: 藉由命名<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>啟動之後可以進行控制。

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the Name property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: 若要暫停、 繼續或互動方式控制<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，設定的名稱屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>物件像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>參考此名稱。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: If the Name of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 如果名稱<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>並未指定，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>無法以互動方式之後會受到影響開始; 此外，當<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>結束，或輸入其填滿期間，動畫時鐘處置掉。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to︰ 使用事件觸發程序來控制分鏡腳本之後啟動](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref>啟動。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"></xref> starts.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> ， <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard"> </xref>啟動。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
